transform.tRule: ######################################################################## # # Preemptive gemination for the Encylopedia Aethiopica Transliteration system. # # This transformation applies the Ethiopic-to-Ethiopic gemination mappings prior to # performing the regular Ethiopic-to-Aethiopica-Latin transform. These mappings # are supported in the forward direction (Ethiopic-to-Latin) only at this time. # # Documentation for these transforms are given in the Ethiopic-Gemination.xml, # and Ethiopic-Latin-Aethiopica.xml files respectively. # ######################################################################## # :: Ethiopic-Gemination ; :: Ethiopic-Latin/Aethiopica ; # ########################################################################
